name: Batch Taxi Trip Processor
description: Processes batch taxi trip data files and loads them into BigQuery Iceberg tables

parameters.name: input_files
parameters.label: Input Files Pattern
parameters.helpText: GCS path pattern for input files (e.g., gs://bucket/path/*.json)

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.label: GCP Project ID
parameters.helpText: Google Cloud Project ID where BigQuery dataset is located

parameters.name: dataset_id
parameters.label: BigQuery Dataset ID
parameters.helpText: BigQuery dataset ID containing the Iceberg tables

parameters.name: table_name
parameters.label: Target Table Name
parameters.helpText: Name of the target BigQuery table (default: taxi_trips)

parameters.name: batch_size
parameters.label: Batch Size
parameters.helpText: Number of records to process in each batch (default: 1000)
